DOC.brief_summary: This 2 week Phase 1 study SB204 ( NVN1000 Gel ) healthy adult volunteer elevate Propionibacterium acne ( P. acne ) count . Subjects apply NVN1000 4 % Gel Vehicle Gel twice daily face . Assessments include cutaneous tolerability , safety , P. acnes count .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study Evaluating Safety Tolerability NVN1000 Gel
DOC.detailed_description: In single-center , vehicle gel-controlled , evaluator subject blind study , approximately 30 otherwise healthy adult subject elevate P. acne count randomized 2:1 NVN1000 4 % Gel Vehicle Gel . The subject apply test material twice daily face wash . Subjects see daily skin study center week apply even weekend dose home . Cutaneous tolerability assess Investigator Baseline , Week 1 , Week 2 . Safety assessment include collection adverse event , laboratory result , clinically significant change physical examination . P. acnes count obtain Baseline , Week 1 Week 2 .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male female volunteer If woman childbearing potential , agree use effective method birth control study 30 day final study visit Agree refrain use antimicrobial topical product study Any skin disorder acute chronic nature include psoriasis , eczema , etc Female subject pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant Subjects use topical systemic antibiotic , estrogen , drug associate methemoglobinemia , nitrate donor Subjects baseline methemoglobin > 2 % Subjects clinically significant anemia
